mapper.insert: insert into board_infos(title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select postno,title,writer,content, updatedate,changedate from board_infos where postno=#{postno} order by postno desc
mapper.update: UPDATE board_infos SET viewcnt = viewcnt + 1 WHERE postno = #{postno}
UPDATE board_infos SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, changedate = sysdate WHERE postno = #{postno}
